name: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai Portable
name_original: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai Portable
description:
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai Portable is an adventure game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
You can play Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai Portable on PSP.
